src/config/theme.ts.description: Created theme type definitions with 5 predefined themes (default, high-contrast, protanopia, deuteranopia, tritanopia). The file exports ThemeColor type, ColorStyle/BorderStyle/UIElementColors/AgentColors/MessageColors/Theme/ThemeOverride interfaces, PREDEFINED_THEMES constant, and helper functions getPredefinedTheme() and mergeTheme().
